instruction: Provide a detailed description for the following product.
input:
Product Name: Drone Phantom 5
Features: Quadcopter, 20-minute flight time, 4K video camera
output: The Drone Phantom 5 is a powerful quadcopter that can take you to new heights! With a 20-minute flight time and 4K video camera, you experience the thrill of flight and capture stunning visuals with crystal clear resolution. Fly safely and securely with the onboard stability and obstacle avoidance system that allows you to navigate through any environment. Enjoy the wonders of flight with the Drone Phantom 5!
